ScreenIsExtended.summary:
The isExtended read-only property of the
interface returns true if the user's device has multiple screens, and false if not.

remarks.para: This property is typically accessed via window.screen.isExtended, and can be used to test whether multiple screens are available before attempting to create a multi-window, multi-screen layout using the Window Management API.
